title: Tonsillectomy in children: Update to guidelines for treating and managing care

title_detail.value: Tonsillectomy in children: Update to guidelines for treating and managing care

summary: The update to the 2011 publication, which includes a large amount of new information that applies to a child considered for tonsillectomy, emphasizes education, counseling, and pain management with several tables and handouts that are user-friendly and helpful to caregivers.
